author: Allyson Chiu
title: Shivering, hallucinating, beaten ‘like a piñata’: Chris Cuomo’s ‘haunted’ night with coronavirus - The Washington Post
description: Shivering, hallucinating, beaten ‘like a piñata’: Chris Cuomo’s ‘haunted’ night with coronavirus The Washington Post Cuomo to Dr. Gupta: You were right about this Covid-19 symptom CNN Coronavirus-stricken Chris Cuomo says he chipped a tooth while shivering Ne…
content:
Let me be proof: Chris Cuomo, a little paler, broadcasts from his basement after testing positive for covid-19
The cause of Cuomos insomnia?
This virus came at me, Ive never seen anything like it, Cuomo said, telling viewers that he was wracked with a fever… [+5356 chars]
